page.title: 12Living in Ditton (Kent)
page.content: I like living in Ditton because the houses are nicely spaced. Right in the middle there is a parade of shops. Grown-ups can get to work easily from here. There is an excellent railway line for people who work in London. There are many things to join such as Cubs, Brownies, Scouts, Guides and Youth Clubs. We have lots of play areas. The swimming pool at Larkfield is not far away. Ditton is an interesting place. By the church are some Tudor cottages and the Old Mill House. Nearby the stream crosses the road and there is a ford. Children like to paddle there. My name is Samantha and I am 11. I have lived in Ditton all my life so I do not know what other places are like to live in but I think Ditton is a great village. - Samantha A.-
